Job Description:
We are looking for an iOS Developer who has the passion for pushing mobile technologies to the limits and will work with our team of talented engineers to design and build our next generation mobile applications. 

Responsibilities 1. Design and build advanced applications for iOS platform 2. Collaborate cross- function with teams to define,  design and ship the new features 

. Unit- test code for robustness,  including edge cases,  usability and general reliability 4.Work on bug fixing and improving the application performance 

5.Continuously discover,  evaluate and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency

What makes you qualified for this post 1.Minimum 1 year of experience in iOS development. 3.A deep understanding with Objective- C

4.Solid understanding of full mobile development life cycle

5.Experience with third- party libraries and APIs

6.Working knowledge of the general mobile technology landscape,  architectures,  trends,  and emerging technologies
